mapper.sql: log_id, ip, page, message, add_user_id, add_time, backup1, backup2, backup3
mapper.insert:
insert into sys_log
log_id,
ip,
page,
message,
add_user_id,
add_time,
backup1,
backup2,
backup3,
#{logId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{page,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{message,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{addUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{addTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{backup1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{backup2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{backup3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update sys_log
ip = #{ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
page = #{page,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
message = #{message,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
add_user_id = #{addUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
add_time = #{addTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
backup1 = #{backup1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
backup2 = #{backup2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
backup3 = #{backup3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where log_id = #{logId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update sys_log set ip = #{ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, page = #{page,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, message = #{message,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, add_user_id = #{addUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, add_time = #{addTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, backup1 = #{backup1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, backup2 = #{backup2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, backup3 = #{backup3,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where log_id = #{logId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
select f.log_id,f.ip,f.page,f.message,f.add_time,f.add_user_id,f.backup1 from (select rownum rn,e.* from ( SELECT a.log_id,a.ip,a.page,a.message,a.add_time,b.display_name as add_user_id,unit.unit_name as backup1 FROM sys_log a,sys_user b,base_unit unit WHERE a.add_user_id=b.user_id and b.unit_code=unit.unit_code
and a.message like '%'||#{message}||'%'
ORDER by add_time desc) e
where rownum <=#{rows}*#{page}) f where rn>(#{page}-1)*#{rows}

select count(*) as listcount FROM sys_log a,sys_user b,base_unit unit WHERE a.add_user_id=b.user_id and b.unit_code=unit.unit_code
and a.message like '%'||#{message}||'%'

select a.log_id,a.ip,a.page,a.message,a.add_time,b.display_name as add_user_id,unit.unit_name as backup1 from sys_log a,sys_user b,base_unit unit WHERE a.add_user_id=b.user_id and b.unit_code=unit.unit_code
and a.message like '%'||#{pd.message}||'%'
ORDER by a.add_time desc
